statements: SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT timestamp, value FROM historical_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT value, timestamp FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM historical_data
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT value, timestamp FROM historical_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT timestamp, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY timestamp HAVING AVG(value) > 25
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) = 3 ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) AS year FROM historical_data GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT AVG(predicted_value) FROM forecasts;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(value) > 50;
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data WHERE value < 50 UNION SELECT forecast_date, predicted_value FROM forecasts WHERE predicted_value > 75;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM historical_data;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, training_data_source FROM forecast_model;
SELECT predicted_value, timestamp FROM predicted_values ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT model_name, training_data_source FROM forecast_model WHERE model_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM predicted_values WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, value FROM historical_data JOIN predicted_values ON historical_data.id = predicted_values.id WHERE predicted_value > value * 1.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, forecast_accuracy FROM forecast_model WHERE forecast_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT date, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM training_data GROUP BY date HAVING total_value > 1000;
SELECT model_name, evaluation_metric, evaluation_value FROM forecast_model JOIN model_evaluation ON forecast_model.model_id = model_evaluation.model_id ORDER BY evaluation_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data WHERE value BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, forecast_accuracy FROM forecast_model WHERE forecast_accuracy >= 0.8;
SELECT data_id, date, value FROM training_data WHERE model_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, model_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_metric, evaluation_value FROM model_evaluation WHERE evaluation_metric LIKE '%accuracy%';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_id, price FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM forecasting_model ORDER BY model_id ASC;
SELECT trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT model_name, training_date FROM forecasting_model WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trend_id, trend_description, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date < '2022-01-01' AND trend_description LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
